mean_cn: n. 失误，过失，行为失检，（时间）流逝，丧失，失效；  v. 失效，暂停
mean_en: an occurrence in which you fail to think or act in the usual or proper way for a brief time and make a mistake
word_etyma: laps滑,滑走+e → 滑离正确的道路 → 堕落；犯错误；失误，差错
sentence: I had a lapse in judgment and put too much soap in the laundry.
sentence_trans: 我做了个失误的判断，洗衣服的时候放了太多肥皂。
